thread.title: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 19
thread.title_full: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 19 - SFGate

author: sfgate.com
title: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 19
text:
Madonna: The tireless pop star returns to the Bay Area with her “Rebel Heart” tour, promoting the album of the same name. 8 p.m. SAP Center, San Jose. www.ticketmaster.com. 
Groundbreakers: The Curran’s new onstage interview series opens with Editor at Large Kevin Sessums in conversation with Michael Riedel , author of “Razzle Dazzle: The Battle for Broadway.” 7 p.m. Curran Theatre , 445 Geary St., S.F. www.sfcurran.com.
